credit_line: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
title: Advertisement for "Tetley's Teas"
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
description: Rectangular, rounded corners, with transfer printed decoration on lid, inscribed "Tetley's Teas" in large red and black type-face, highlighted in yellow, featuring central image of blue elephant's head with red kerchief, elephant holds at end of curled trunk box on a string, box inscribed "Indian Ceylon," above box inscription reads "Trade Mark," all on off-white ground, edges, sides and underside gold. Lid hinged at back. Striker on underside.
name: Matchsafe
